content.html: Phone-tracking firm Anomaly Six has amassed so much app data it recently held an incredible closed-door demonstration: The company geofenced the CIA and NSA, tracked someone who had visited both sites around the country, and then de-anonymized them theintercept.com/2022/04/22/ano…
